messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: photos
messages.msgSnippet: I d be glad to put pink braids into Chloe s hair.  HOwever, she must be still for a LONG time.  Like 4-5 hours.   If she s willing to do that, I m willing to
messages.messageBody:
I'd be glad to put pink braids into Chloe's hair. HOwever, she must be
still for a LONG time. Like 4-5 hours. If she's willing to do that,
I'm willing to try.

btw, that would be using big braids. Lexie's hair took longer, like two
days, 6 or so hours each day.

Joylyn

messages.subject: Re: photos
messages.msgSnippet: Nice pictures Joylyn. Great action shots of them both. Chloe said she wishes her team could have those hot pink shirts like Janene. She didn t like soccer too
messages.messageBody:
Nice pictures Joylyn. Great action shots of them both. Chloe said
she wishes her team could have those hot pink shirts like Janene.
She didn't like soccer too much (too much running she said) even
though she was really good and scored goals. She likes gymnastics
and ballet.

Oh and now Chloe wants some hot pink braids now after seeing the
girls with the blue and purple braids. Thank you very much ;)

Ticia

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] photos
messages.msgSnippet: ... My fault. Since the only people uploading files were the hot dates spammers, I turned off the ability for members to upload files. I didn t realize it
messages.messageBody:
on 11/16/03 12:23 AM, joylyn at joylyn@... wrote:

> I have some great photos of the girls playing soccer, but I can't seem
> to add them to the always learning website? Why?

My fault. Since the only people uploading files were the "hot dates"
spammers, I turned off the ability for members to upload files. I didn't
realize it also turned off uploading photos.

Try again. It should work.

Joyce

messages.subject: photos
messages.msgSnippet: I have some great photos of the girls playing soccer, but I can t seem to add them to the always learning website?  Why? Joylyn
messages.messageBody:
I have some great photos of the girls playing soccer, but I can't seem
to add them to the always learning website? Why?

Joylyn

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] photos
messages.msgSnippet: ... What beautiful sweetie-pies, Joylyn!  Thanks for putting those pictures up! I thought I would add pictures of us, too, so I added a picture of my son Liam,
messages.messageBody:
At 02:50 12/19/02 -0800, you wrote:
>I just put 3 new photos of the girls on the photo page, in an album
>called Joylyn, go take a peek, I just love these pictures!
>
>Joylyn

What beautiful sweetie-pies, Joylyn! Thanks for putting those pictures up!

I thought I would add pictures of us, too, so I added a picture of my son
Liam, and that went well. Then, I tried to add pix of dh and me, but I
haven't been able to due to one of those computer glitches that prevents
you from doing things you ought to be able to do. But, I'm glad I got
Liam's picture up!

Thanks again, Joylyn; your daughters are just beautiful.

Marji

AlwaysLearning site. http://photos.groups.yahoo.com/group/AlwaysLearning/lst

uploaded it for me!!!!

THANK YOU!!!

--pam
